title: Adaptive Online Interactive Education Course for Complex Dynamic Systems Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic systems thinking and experience in analyzing social systems
context.additional_context: A process supporting practicing elementary teachers in systematically analyzing complex social phenomena within social studies curricula and applying design thinking methodologies.

learning_goals: Learners can model causal loop structures of dynamic systems with 80% accuracy
Learners can revise system behavior patterns at least three times using real-time feedback systems
Learners can establish at least two personalized learning strategies based on learning analytics reports
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
